document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of Papua New Guinea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of Papua New Guinea

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hemigaleus australiensis White, Last & Compagno, 2005: 40
, Fig. 1 . Holotype: CSIRO H 5949-01. Type locality: northwest of Geraldton, Western Australia.

Local synonymy:
Negogaleus microstoma
- Filewood, 1973 : 3 (PNG).
Hemigaleus microstoma—
Kailola, 1987 : 20 (western Papua; Gulf of Papua; Orangerie Bay; New Britain?);
White et al. , 2018
: 122, figs (PNG).

PNG

Remarks: Once considered to be conspecific with
Hemigaleus microstoma Bleeker, 1852
which occurs in the Western Central Pacific. White et al. (2005) noted that its presence in PNG needs validating. Restricted to northern Australia and PNG ; possibly restricted to the southern coast from Western Province through to Orangerie Bay.
